sys_ui_page.description: Display's the "Select a Category" dialog for the "Add Category" UI Action on the Time Sheet form.
sys_ui_page.html: var arrayUtil = new global.ArrayUtil(); var json = new global.JSON(); var categories = []; var account; var currentRecordID = RP.getReferringURL().split('sys_id=')[1].split('&')[0]; var timeSheet = new TimeSheet(currentRecordID); var user = timeSheet.gr.user; var parentAccounts = new GlideRecord('x_dehp_time_track_accounts'); parentAccounts.addQuery('active=true^parent=NULL'); parentAccounts.query(); while(parentAccounts.next()) { account = new Account(parentAccounts); categories = arrayUtil.union(categories, account.getCategories(user, false)); } categories.sort();
